column5: Good morning, if you're going away today, don't forget to pack your patience    Have fun, drive carefully, be safe and DON'T forget the camera    Double check your trailer as well, one person had an accident on the 400 this morning already  when they lost theirs  If you're like me and are working part or most of the weekend  not to worry, you have next week to look forward to when the little darlings return to school  Maureen
Good morning Mo....  We are heading down to BnB's tomorrow morning for the long weekend, and believe me... after a 58 hr work week, am I L  king forward to it....  You have a good safe weekend too...
happy long weekend and can't wait for kiddies to go back next week.they are getting restless
good bye summer hello fall    and bay of quinte
